name: DreamLand (itch) (DevFatib)
description:
Imagine being stuck in layers of dreams that are filled with dread and frost. It's pretty horrible.  However, that's where you, the player, come into play.

GUIDE YOUR PLAYER THROUGH THE DREAMS

You are given access to various mechanics throughout the game to complete each level. Each level is filled with various and new obstacles that hinder your pathway to freedom. You must overcome all these obstacles to seek freedom.

TRY TO MAKE SENSE OUT OF THE VAGUE STORY PROVIDED

Through various lines of internal monologue, you are given the chance to make something out of the monologue.

Anyway, have FUN playing the game.

Note: If the WebGL version of the game does not work, feel free to download the exe version of the game. (Windows users only)
